scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n api,worker,handler,dash -c bgBlue,bgGreen,bgYellow,bgMagenta "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:worker" "bun run dev:handler" "bun run dev:dash"
scripts.dev:api: cd packages/api-server && PORT=3000 bun run dev
scripts.dev:handler: cd packages/request-handler && PORT=8000 bun run dev
scripts.dev:dash: cd packages/dashboard && PORT=3001 bun run dev
scripts.build:all: bun run build:shared && bun run build:ai && bun run build:db && bun run build:api && bun run build:worker && bun run build:handler && bun run build:dash
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/db && bunx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: cd packages/db && bunx prisma db push
